"Koffie":
"<%me>.
Thank you for all your hard work. This is administrator Koffie."
"In light of your recent activities, we have granted you permission to use new Complex Photon Arts."
"Your abilities have already been proven. We hope you will continue to play an active role in future battles."
"However, please do not allow yourself to become overwhelmed. Thank you in advance for all you will do for us."
